description: Run FFmpeg commands in the cloud for fast video and audio conversions, edits, and workflowsâ€”no local install required. Chain multiple commands efficiently, monitor progress, and fetch results with direct download links and metadata. Clean up output files when finished to control storage.

rendiApiKey.description: Your Rendi API key for FFmpeg cloud processing. Get your API key at https://rendi.dev

capabilities.name: test_rendi_connection
capabilities.description: Test connectivity to Rendi FFmpeg API and validate your API key

capabilities.name: run_ffmpeg_command
capabilities.description: Submit a single FFmpeg command for cloud processing. Use {{alias}} placeholders for files (e.g., {{in_1}}, {{out_1}}). Input files must start with 'in_' and be publicly accessible URLs. Output files must start with 'out_'.

capabilities.name: run_chained_ffmpeg_commands
capabilities.description: Submit multiple sequential FFmpeg commands where outputs from earlier commands can be used as inputs in later commands. This is more efficient than running commands separately. Maximum 10 commands per chain.

capabilities.name: poll_ffmpeg_command
capabilities.description: Check the status of a previously submitted FFmpeg command (single or chained). Returns current status, processing time, and output files with download URLs when complete.

capabilities.name: delete_command_files
capabilities.description: Delete all output files associated with a completed command. This frees up storage space on Rendi's servers. Note: This action cannot be undone.
